ygData.subject: Re: Hunting 46-50
ygData.msgSnippet: Rangers can solo EW to a certain extent on some of the animals there.  Fear Kiting works wonders.  Necros can also use a similar tact by fearing and the
ygData.messageBody:
Rangers can solo EW to a certain extent on some of the animals
there. Fear Kiting works wonders. Necros can also use a similar
tact by fearing and the sending their pet in after the mob.

While EW can be soloed, you have to be very careful of dervishes and
giants. First off, even at level 55+ dervishes will be much lower
in level but can still hurt you plenty. The hit hard, and can
quikcly gang up if there is more than one in the area. The second
danger is the giants that roam. While these guys are easily
quelmed, they also hit hard and can gang up. If you are fighting
one of these and a dervish or two join in... well you better be a
tank with massive HP, be a necro with a pet, or have an extra pair
of shoes in the bank because you are going to be on a CR soon.

Also, EW has one additional danger that many people do not think
about. If you are fighting near the Kael ramp you don't want to
linger. Hanging around the Kael ramp too long spawns the Death
Squad and these things will tear through anything that is not on
their faction. Just a heads up.

Drago

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
>
> I think if you fight in EW it's best to say near the bridge to IC
and to be
> careful. there can be lots of adds. One good method I saw a druid
using was
> to snare a mob then cast camo on herself and run back to the
bridge. That
> way other mobs didn't see her running.
> Also, if you can use the spell to charm an animal you can charm a
wolf or
> kitty to help you. Only problem is when charm wears off. If things
go bad
> you can run accross the bridge to zone.
> I believe I hunted in DL at that lvl, but I'm a cleric so I
couldn't solo.
> If you have Lost Dungeons of Norrath it's really great xp. I know
you can't
> solo, but the xp in group is worth it.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > my friend says that other ppl told her to solo in eastern
wastes......
> shes the same lvl and a dru!
> > -lori
> >
> > Masteradept <masteradept007@y...> wrote:
> > Ok I'm asking the question....I'm a 46 druid...and I'm wondering

in
